original_text: And I will write on the tables the words that were in the first tables which thou brakest, and thou shalt put them in the ark.
korean_text: 네가 깨뜨린 처음 판에 쓴 말을 내가 그 판에 쓰리니 너는 그것을 그 궤에 넣으라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: And I will write on the tables
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 서판 위에 기록할 것이니

sentences.original_text: the words that were in the first tables
and thou shalt put them in the ark
